weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm cold and white. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm made of frozen water.
🏔️ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need to wear gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I'm hot and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ Plants need me to grow.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm out.
🌡️ I make it feel warm.

weather.question: I come from the sky, and I make things wet. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💧 I am made of water.
🌧️ I can help flowers grow.

weather.question: I move the trees, but you can't see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make kites fly.
🌬️ I'm a current of air.
🪁 Sometimes I whisper, sometimes I howl.

weather.question: I'm white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep sometimes.
🌧️ I can bring rain.
☁️ I am made of tiny water droplets.

weather.question: I’m a colorful arc made when sun shines through rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors, like red, orange, and yellow.
☀️ I appear after it rains when the sun is out.
🍀 Some people think there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a storm with a swirling center. I have very strong winds.

hints.text: 🌀 I form over warm ocean water.
💨 I am a type of tropical cyclone.
🏠 People sometimes need to evacuate when I arrive.

weather.question: I am white, round, and hard. I fall from the sky and can hurt!

hints.text: 🧊 I am a form of precipitation.
🤕 Sometimes I am the size of marbles or even golf balls!
🚗 Cars need to be careful when I fall.

weather.question: I am a cloud that touches the ground. It makes it hard to see.

hints.text: 👻 I look like a spooky ghost!
🚦 You have to drive slowly when I am around.
🌫️ I am made of tiny water droplets close to the ground.

weather.question: I am a sudden spark of electricity in the sky that can be loud and bright. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am often followed by thunder.
🌩️ I am dangerous.
🌳 You shouldn't stand under a tree when I appear.

plant.question: I wear a crown, but I'm not a king. Monkeys love to peel me and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when ripe.
🌴 I grow on a tree in warm places.
😋 You can eat me for a healthy snack.

plant.question: I am green, leafy, and good for you. Rabbits love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am often in salads.
🥬 I am a type of vegetable.
🐇 Some animals enjoy me as a meal.

plant.question: I have a stem and petals, and bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.
🌷 I come in many different colors.
🐝 Bees collect nectar from me.

plant.question: I grow underground, and I'm a popular side dish, especially when mashed. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 People make fries out of me.
🍚 I am a starchy vegetable.
🌎 I am grown all over the world.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, and birds build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 People use me to build houses.
🍂 I lose my leaves in the fall.
🦉 I provide shelter for animals.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy treat when heated. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You often eat me at the movies.
🌽 I come from a cob.
💥 I make a popping sound.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and green flesh. Some people call me a Kiwi fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am named after a bird.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon.
🌿 I have tiny black seeds inside.

plant.question: I have needles instead of leaves and stay green all year round. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 People decorate me during Christmas.
🌲 My cones carry seeds.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.

plant.question: I am a spicy root that can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am often used in cooking.
😭 I have many layers.
🤧 I can make your eyes water.

plant.question: I am a climbing plant that produces sweet, juicy bunches of fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in green, red, and purple colors.
🍷 People make juice and wine from me.
☀️ I need lots of sunshine to grow.
